post.body: Your kids will LOVE that.
Well, Todd saw the phrase "snow penis" and I guess I have to pre-apologize to the neighbors now.
Just save me some of that meth flavored cream cheese you must have down there.
I installed WPhone.
And it's still snowing. Stupid weather.
She's from the south. What does she know of bagels?
I think the point is he doesn't want to tweet, he just wants to read the tweets of the people he chooses to follow.
thank you!
But if I add the blog title, it goes over my image, no?
And every time I see a short, fat person I think he's gonna puke on me.
Of all the special zombies in that game, I hate the witch the most.
Did you fall for that phishing DM? The few people who did said whoever got into their account started unfollowing people.
I'm not sure if I want to fuck Anthony Bourdain, or just drink, eat and travel with him. Or both.
My car smells like old Red Bull cans, cigarettes and fast food. The odormeter would think I'm a college kid.
Borders actually sent me a coupon for the Natamos going out of business sale. That's a long trip for 40% off, but thanks.
Odorrmeter? The connotations of that are limitless.
Ok. How's this? Certainly won't help people thinking I'm a guy. But I like it.
I'm changing it again, momentarily. Can't say you'll love the new one!
is pooping at 6am. Must be Sunday.
Valentine's Day jewelry, my ass. I'm holding out for a big screen tv.
Left 4 Dead. I think Todd is having an affair with the AI chick. Because SHE got the health pack without asking him for it.
Yes, I have a talking dick. My ex husband.
Newspapers these days are more or less bags of poo, anyhow.
One more plug of the new site for my album reviews before I go. For the normal people who aren't up at 6am. http://thisisnotpitchfork.com/
Gonna play some Left 4 Dead before I go to Target. I call it practicing.
"Why do the cats keep knocking the ornaments off during the night?" "You have cats?" "No, and that's why I'm pissed!" (@melodik)
Four cups of coffee, two Excedrin, blaster at my side. I think I'm ready to go to Target.
Oh WordPress and your plugins, I love you.
Review 138. The Police - Outlandos dâ€™Amour http://thisisnotpitchfork.com/?p=149
New home for my music reviews! No more blogger! Check it out, let me know what you think. Paint is still wet. http://thisisnotpitchfork.com/
Holy hell. Who knew it would be so easy to import from blogspot to wordpress? Took me three minutes and two clicks.
Review #138: The Police, Outlandos d'Amour http://twurl.nl/3asvtk
"The chosen one gets a golden gameboy and the rest get shot." "And that's today's test of the 'are you listening to Todd' emergency system."
#153: B-52s, S/T http://twurl.nl/h5ckyu
Waking myself up this morning by dancing this mess around: http://blip.fm/~1ezcg
CNN is reaching for news. An article on farting in front of your spouse: http://twurl.nl/w0hd6e
I haven't seen my son in three days, but I can tell from the stench of boy sweat coming from his room that he's alive.

That's right. I'm jealous of a video game character. I shoot her every time Todd tries to save her life.
I need to get out of the house.
"You should have taken my health pack when I offered." "Whatever. Hope you liked watching me die." I put the passive aggressive in gaming.
There are Rice Krispy treats coming out of my pores.
